column4: Every bar has the sign 00 on it when unmuted and MM when muted. But PCM doesn't have either one of those, it's simply blank
Do you think that could have anything to say?
Hey everyone :) I have a problem. I just upgraded from 11.04 to 11.10. Everything worked fine on 11.04, but on 11.10, my Jack port doesn't seem to work.
When I plug something into it, my internal speakers go silent as intended, but whatever I plugged in gives no sound. I run a laptop.
Everything in AlsaMixer is unmuted except for PCM which doesn't have that option.
then hold on while I look something up
yeah theres a bug report for your card. apparently you're not the only one with that problem with alsa.
Does that mean I should just sit tight and wait for a fix? Or is there something I can do?
you can try a different sound system
What do you mean by sound system? Software? Or do you mean hardware?
it's software but I'm probably not the best guy to walk you through a new sound system instal
the fastest way would be a live cd or usb
